description:
Mawari is a decentralized infrastructure network designed to deliver real-time, AI-powered 3D content for immersive experiences across Extended Reality (XR) applications. It leverages a global network of distributed GPU nodes—referred to as Guardian Nodes—to stream high-fidelity, interactive 3D content with ultra-low latency.


Central to its architecture is the Mawari Engine, a proprietary streaming technology that dynamically allocates computational, storage, and bandwidth resources based on user proximity and network conditions, enabling responsive and context-aware XR experiences. The network supports various use cases, including location-based augmented reality, real-time digital humans, and immersive storytelling that adapts to user interactions. Through initiatives like the Decentralized Infrastructure Offering (DIO), Mawari invites individuals to contribute compute resources as Guardian Node Operators, earning rewards tied to network revenue and usage.


Additionaly, Mawari is launching its dedicated L2/L3 blockchain based on Arbitrum Orbit.

description: Neova is a decentralized protocol designed to enhance data management through a decentralized infrastructure. It operates as a DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Network) layer, focusing on providing secure, private, and user-friendly cloud solutions. Neova powered by @AvailProject.
